solution_line_template: He has {total_kg}-{sold_to_market_kg}= <<{total_kg}-{sold_to_market_kg}={remaining_kg}>>{remaining_kg} kilograms of mangoes left after selling them to the market.

Colby sold {sold_to_community_fraction_numerator}/{sold_to_community_fraction_denominator} x {remaining_kg} = <<{sold_to_community_fraction_numerator}/{sold_to_community_fraction_denominator}*{remaining_kg}={sold_to_community_kg}>>{sold_to_community_kg} kilograms of mangoes to the community.
Therefore, Colby still has {kg_left}x{mangoes_per_kg}= <<{kg_left}*{mangoes_per_kg}={mangoes_left}>>{mangoes_left} pieces of mangoes.
